response.overview: This movie shows the severe caning of a maid in front of her boss and "Agency" employers. This movie reveals the madness of rich people in Russia. Special "Agency" which hired xXxr, young and attractive girls to work as maids in rich Russian households. Humiliating and painful punishments were permitted and often used by these "Agencies" to keep the girls fully compliant. This movie shows the severe caning of a maid in front of her boss and "Agency" employers.
response.title: Agency
